query: UPDATE chat_messages SET user_content = COALESCE(?, user_content), thinking_summary = COALESCE(?, thinking_summary), assistant_content = COALESCE(?, assistant_content), thinking_effort = COALESCE(?, thinking_effort), input_tokens = COALESCE(?, input_tokens), output_tokens = COALESCE(?, output_tokens), reasoning_tokens = COALESCE(?, reasoning_tokens), total_tokens = COALESCE(?, total_tokens) WHERE message_id = ?
